resources.string: Do you like to see more characters?

It is a period of civil war.

Rebel spaceships, striking

from a hidden base, have won

their first victory against

the evil Galactic Empire.



During the battle, Rebel

spies managed to steal secretr
plans to the Empire's

ultimate weapon, the DEATH

STAR, an armored space

station with enough power

to destroy an entire planet.



Pursued by the Empire's

sinister agents, Princess

Leia races home aboard her

starship, custodian of the

stolen plans that can save her

people and restore

freedom to the galaxy....
May the force be with you !
Fair Skin, blond hair and blue eyes
blue, green, yellow, brown, golden, red eyes\nblack, brown hair
Death Star - DS-1 Orbital Battle Station
Deep Space Mobile Battlestation\n\nMade by Imperial Department of Military Research, Sienar Fleet Systems
Transports 342953 to 843342 people\nWith 3 years worth of supply\nAnd 3000 kilos of cargo
Death Star - DS-1 Orbital Battle Station
Deep Space Mobile Battlestation\n\nMade by Imperial Department of Military Research, Sienar Fleet Systems
Speed: 10 MGLT per hour\nHyperdrive Rating: 4.0\nMax Atmosphering Speed: n/a
Transports 342953 to 843342 people\nWith 3 years worth of supply

It is a dark time for the Rebellion. Although the Death Star has been destroyed, Imperial troops have driven the Rebel forces from their hidden base and pursued them across the galaxy. Evading the dreaded Imperial Starfleet, a group of freedom fighters led by Luke Skywalker has established a new secret base on the remote ice world of Hoth. The evil lord Darth Vader, obsessed with finding young Skywalker, has dispatched thousands of remote probes into the far reaches of space...
